page.title: 06BALMEDIE SCHOOL
page.content: Our group found out that 337 pupils attend Balmedie school.It is a double stream school with 13 full time teachers,2 assistant head teachers and 1 head teacher.We also have visiting teachers of gym,art,drama, and music.There is also a janitor a secretary,4 cleaning ladies and 7 kitchen staff.During the week there are also other classes run by other people,eg Junior football,Saturday club,Adult Football training. There are two different sections in the school,(senior end and junior end).The school was opened in 1974. At school we study maths,language arts,health,science,gym,music,art, religion and drama.Children come to school at the age of 4 1/2 and leave p7 at the age of 11 or 12.
